rows.label: tlk44300183_03_msg0001
rows.name:
This might be the last dinner I ever eat.
It's a sad thought, but here we are...

rows.label: tlk44300183_03_msg0002
rows.name:
I wish I had had a chance to try more
of the delicious foods and drinks that
Alst has on offer.

rows.label: tlk44300183_03_msg0003
rows.name:
I wish I'd traveled more, seen
Gula at least... But in reality,
I've never even left Luxuria...
